text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi What about testing, tracing and isolating here.  You have wasted more than 3 months on your rhetoric. #coronavirus #TrumpLiesPeopleDie #MAGA is just a slogan to get idiots to #VoteRed.  #TrumpMustGo
